text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After school, I decide to kill some time<n>in the trainer's office
until my training<n>session with Nice Nature, but as I<n>open
the door, I see a familiar face.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Heyo, Trainer. I was just about to<n>knock.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Of course, star students are always<n>punctual... Just kidding.
A friend of<n>mine lent me this manga, so I've<n>been flipping
through it.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
The title's "Beyond the Turf"—you<n>know it, Trainer? It's all
the rage with<n>the kids lately.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I take a look at the manga on the<n>desk. On the cover is an
illustration of<n>an Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Looks like you don't.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
That's no good—you gotta keep up<n>with what the
youngsters are into<n>nowadays... Not that I knew about it till<n>
today either.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
That's why my friend basically<n>forced it on me, y'know. I
can see<n>why it's so popular, though—it really<n>sucks you in.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
It tells the story of an Umamusume<n>aiming to be loved by all
as she<n>competes with rivals and friends<n>alike.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
And get this—I just got to the part<n>where her dream of
winning the Triple<n>Crown gets shattered. Man, that was<n>a
real nail-biter.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
"As long as I keep running, my dream<n>will never die!" When
she said that, I<n>got the chills.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Yup, yup, she's the kinda protagonist<n>you wanna root for.
It's like, she's<n>got that extra spark, y'know?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
She's talented but also super<n>hardworking and sticks to her
beliefs.<n>Pretty much the perfect Umamusume!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
...Well, I guess that's to be expected<n>from a fictional
character.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
But you know, girls like her really do<n>exist. In fact, there's a
few right here<n>at this academy.
choice_data_list: We can't lose to them, now can we?!
We can't lose to them, now can we?!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: C-come on, don't try to pump me up<n>like that!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
If I was in this manga, I'd be the side<n>character who's
comforting the crying<n>protagonist.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: She even talks like I do. Like here...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: "No matter how hard you try, thereare hurdles you just can't overcome."That's so me.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Makes me wanna go tell her, "Stop<n>being a wet blanket and
suck it up."<n>Haha, you know that feeling of<n>disliking
someone too similar to you?

text_block_list.name: Nature's Friend
text_block_list.text:
Excuse me, is Natie—ah, there you<n>are. I finished the latest
volume of<n>"Beyond the Turf," so I brought it over<n>for you.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ohhh, thanks!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I was just telling Trainer about this<n>manga. You know that
side character<n>who's always hanging around the<n>main
character?

text_block_list.name: Nature's Friend
text_block_list.text:
Oh, she really pops off in the newest<n>volume! Every one of
her lines really<n>resonated with me!

text_block_list.name: Nature's Friend
text_block_list.text:
"I'm not a prodigy... But I want to<n>keep trying, keep winning,
and see my<n>happily ever after!" Like, sooo<n>amazing!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, spoilers! For real, though? She<n>said all that? Huh? As
a side<n>character?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
N-no no no no! You think I'd ever talk<n>about my "happily
ever after"?

text_block_list.name: Nature's Friend
text_block_list.text:
You know, Natie, recently you seem<n>more serious, or like—I
can feel your<n>passion from the way you run.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Not you too?! No way, no way,<n>no way! Not a chance!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ah, look at the time—we gotta start<n>training! To the track we
go!
choice_data_list: Let's see your happily ever after!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
C'mooon! I told you already, I'd<n>never say something like
that!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Nature and I head for the track, where<n>another fruitful day of
training awaits.
